com.inmobi.messaging.consumer

Interface MessageConsumer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMessageConsumer, AbstractMessagingDatabusConsumer, DatabusConsumer, HadoopConsumer, StdInConsumer

    public interface MessageConsumer
    Interface for consuming a message stream.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close and cleanup all resources such as connection, file handles etc.
      boolean isMarkSupported()
      Tells if this interface supports mark and reset methods
      void mark()
      Mark the position in the stream up to last read message.
      Message next()
      Reads the next message It is a blocking call which waits for the message to be available on the stream
      Message next(long timeout, TimeUnit timeunit)
      Reads the next message if it is available with in the specified timeout.
      void reset()
      Reset to last the marked position

    • Method Detail

      • next

        Message next()
             throws InterruptedException,
                    EndOfStreamException
        Reads the next message It is a blocking call which waits for the message to be available on the stream
        Returns:
        Message object
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if interrupted while waiting for Message
        EndOfStreamException - When consumer consumed all messages in the stream

      • next

        Message next(long timeout,
           TimeUnit timeunit)
             throws InterruptedException,
                    EndOfStreamException
        Reads the next message if it is available with in the specified timeout.
        Returns:
        Message object if available within timeout Null otherwise
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if interrupted while waiting for Message
        EndOfStreamException - When consumer consumed all messages in the stream

      • isMarkSupported

        boolean isMarkSupported()
        Tells if this interface supports mark and reset methods
        Returns:
        boolean The value true mark and reset are supported false otherwise.

      • mark

        void mark()
          throws IOException
        Mark the position in the stream up to last read message.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • reset

        void reset()
           throws IOException
        Reset to last the marked position
        Throws:
        IOException

      • close

        void close()
        Close and cleanup all resources such as connection, file handles etc.
